mapper.select: SELECT restaurant_id AS restaurantID, business_id AS businessId, business_tel AS tel, business_name AS name, business_number AS number FROM business_user WHERE business_id = #{businessId}

SELECT r.reservation_id AS resvId, b.restaurant_id AS restaurantId, r.reservation_date AS resvDate, r.reservation_time AS resvTime, r.count_people AS headCount, r.reservation_state AS status FROM reservation r JOIN business_user b ON b.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id WHERE r.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC;
